author: Swalve, Bernhardus, approximately 1625-1680
title: Querelae & opprobria ventriculi, sive, [Prosopopoiia] ejusdem naturalia sua sibi vendicantis, & abusus tam diaeteticos, quam pharmaceuticos perstringentis / operâ ac studio Bernhardi Swalve
imprint: "Amstelodami: Ex officina Joannis Janssonii à Waesberge, & et Elizei Weyerstraten, 1664"
